title: Mount Brè: Adventure for your Family in Switzerland
description: Join us as we explore the breathtaking beauty of Mount Brè in Lugano, Switzerland!

text.value: Monte Brè is one of the most important mountains in the city of Lugano, Southern Switzerland. Also known as the sunniest mountain in the country, it is the starting point for several trails: Brè-Lake Lugano; Brè-Cureggia; Presences of art: cultural itinerary; Brè-Mount Boglia; Landscapes and Culture: Discovering the thousand Faces of the Brè; among other options that you can find on the

The splendor of nature and the views offered at its peak were the motivators for the construction of a funicular that facilitated the connection between the city and the mountain over 115 years ago. sections.title: How to get there
text: There are several options to access Mount Brè, choose below the one that best suits your needs and enjoy yourself!

text: In the video, we explain the boarding process for the funicular ride to Monte Brè. We were directed to embark at the intermediate station, called Suvigliana, as it offers more convenience for passengers with a baby stroller. This recommendation stems from the fact that the Cassarate station, while accessible, is fully automated and lacks personnel on-site to assist with boarding.

For those opting to board at Cassarate, it's essential to note that the station's automated nature means there won't be any staff available to aid passengers. If you choose this station, you'll need to be prepared to navigate the process independently. This includes folding the baby stroller and passing through a narrow turnstile with it, ensuring it can be maneuvered smoothly through the station.

While Cassarate remains a viable option for boarding, especially for those with specific preferences or logistical considerations, we advise passengers to consider the ease of boarding at Suvigliana, where assistance and a more accommodating boarding process are available.
